title: Sri Narong Stadium
text:
Sri Narong Stadium () is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Surin%20Province">Surin Province</a>, <a href="Thailand">Thailand</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home stadium of <a href="Surin%20City%20F.C.">Surin City F.C.</a>.
This stadium used to be a boxing match between <a href="Khaosai%20Galaxy">Khaosai Galaxy</a> and Alberto Castro of Columbia in 1989, for Khaosai 11th defense of the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Association">WBA</a> <a href="Junior%20bantamweight">Junior bantamweight</a> world title, the competition results are Khaosai won by TKO in 10th round.
